About Pensacola
Send Us a Message
Explore Pensacola, FL
Welcome to beautiful Pensacola, Florida – where soaked-in sunsets, sparkling emerald waters, and soft white sands await you, with tons of fun things to do! At Vacay Village, we strive to give you a relaxing and enjoyable stay with wonderful
amenities
, but there’s plenty to do outside Vacay Village too! There’s always a fun festival, concert, market, or special event happening around Pensacola, and you won’t want to miss a thing. Experience the wonders of the Pensacola area while staying at Vacay Village and create unforgettable memories with your family soon!
Rates & Availability
Rich History & Culture
Over the centuries, Pensacola has been home to numerous tribes, natives, and colonizers, and it is this mix of influences that makes the city so unique and fascinating. History buffs can immerse themselves in its rich past at the top-rated National Naval Aviation Museum, Pensacola Lighthouse, and Fort Pickens, while nature lovers can explore the Blackwater River State Forest’s hiking trails and the Gulf Islands National Seashores, among others.
Our Accommodations
Spectacular Beaches & Outdoor Activities
For fun seekers, Pensacola has some of the best beaches in Florida, with top spots such as
Opal Beach
,
Pensacola Beach
, and
Perdido Key Beach
offering the perfect places to bask in the sun, go for a swim, and indulge in water sports like surfing, paddleboarding, and parasailing. Sports enthusiasts can also catch the Blue Angel’s Flight Team on Tuesdays and Wednesdays, free of charge for practices, for an unforgettable aeronautical display.
Top 10 Beaches in the Pensacola Area!
Things To Do
There is no shortage of things to do in the Pensacola area! Here are just a few of the favorites:
Amusement Parks
Watch the Blue Angels
Shopping
Dolphin Tours
Pontoon Boat Rental
Beaches
Fishing
Scuba Diving & Snorkeling
Horseback Riding
Bird Watching
Golfing
Hiking & Walking Trails
Water Sports & Paddling
Sailing
Biking
Surfing
And More!
Frequently Aked Questions
What attractions are near Vacay Village?
Pensacola offers a variety of attractions, including beautiful beaches like Opal Beach and Pensacola Beach, historical sites like the National Naval Aviation Museum, and outdoor activities in the Blackwater River State Forest.
Are there any local events or festivals?
Yes, Pensacola hosts numerous festivals, concerts, markets, and special events throughout the year.
Can I watch the Blue Angels during my stay?
Yes, the Blue Angels Flight Team practices on Tuesdays and Wednesdays, offering free admission to their spectacular shows.
What outdoor activities are available?
Guests can enjoy activities such as dolphin tours, fishing, scuba diving, snorkeling, horseback riding, bird watching, golfing, hiking, biking, and various water sports.
How far is Vacay Village from Pensacola Beach?
Vacay Village is just a short distance from the stunning Pensacola Beach, making it convenient for guests to enjoy the sun and surf.
